message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $18,000.  I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the opportunity,  $18,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product, which is fair considering its value to me. I'm open to discussing a compromise, but I won't go above my budget.
